# Leonardo Da Vinci Medal

Academic award administered by the IDEA League recognising excellence in mathematics, engineering and creative innovation. Successor to the historic Prix Poncelet (1868-present).

## About

The Leonardo Da Vinci Medal is a European academic distinction awarded annually in rotation by TU Delft, ETH Zürich, RWTH Aachen, Chalmers, and Politecnico di Milano.

## Purpose

- Highlight outstanding contributions bridging mathematics and engineering  
- Preserve the scientific legacy of the historical Prix Poncelet  
- Promote academic excellence across Europe
